Articles.Content:
With the movie Interstellar creating so much talk about black holes lately, I'm wondering what the possibilities are for making a mod that creates a black hole in the furthest outskirts of the Kerbol system. A whole new batch of science possibilities await, not to mention a whole new way to kill off Kerbals ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Thoughts? Comments? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Sounds like something Kopernicus can do, but the event horizon probably won't work.
